description: Quickstart: self-contained hello target (argv command, no shell). Writes deterministic hello_result.json.

command:
import hashlib,json,sys
from pathlib import Path
inp=Path(sys.argv[1])
out=Path(sys.argv[2])
out.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
data=inp.read_bytes()
(out/'hello_result.json').write_text(json.dumps({'byte_length': len(data), 'sha256': hashlib.sha256(data).hexdigest()}, sort_keys=True)+'\n', encoding='utf-8')
